channel.title: Video on Corinne Chin | Video Journalist
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Corinne Chin | Video Journalist

item.title: About
item.description: Corinne Chin is a Senior Video Journalist at The Seattle Times and the founder and leader of the newsroom’s Diversity & Inclusion Task Force. As a storyteller, she focuses on in-depth digital video projects like Beyond the Border, a series of visual stories exploring asylum, deportation and border issues supported by the International Women’s Media Foundation and the Pulitzer Center on Crisis Reporting; and Under Our Skin, an interactive documentary exploring the words we use – and misuse – to talk about race in America.
